languages.text: While under the effect of {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}Confident Approach{/g}, the Arch-Militant keeps half of the usual {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatility{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Under the effect of Confident Approach the Veteran keeps half of the usuall bonuses from Right Tool for the Job.
